title: Apartments
description: Strong Guy is only able to live in bottom floor apartments, else he runs the risk of breaking through the floor and disturbing tenants living below him.

title: Phones
description: Syed is forced to exclusively use voice commands to operate his phone. He has broken too many glass screens while typing with too much force during internet arguments.

title: Tires
description: Syed has to take constant trips to the mechanics to change his tires, since his mass is too much for them to handle. Sometimes as much as four times a year. Please donate to help him solve this ongoing issue.

title: Shoes
description: Strong Guy DOES not WEAR shoes. He claims they limit his ability to run "as fast, if not faster, than a cheetah". If you can find a picture of Strong Guy wearing shoes, he will pay you a sum of $4,000.00 and then proceed with the removal of that picture from the internet.
